participant_1.name: Ava
participant_1.personality: Creative and passionate about music, enjoys songwriting and collaboration with friends.
participant_1.background: I wish i could spend more time at home. I have taken formal music lessons since i was 5. I like to write my own songs. My best friend is in a band with me. I am a musician.

participant_2.name: Ethan
participant_2.personality: Enthusiastic and outgoing, loves to make friends and explore different forms of art.
participant_2.background: My dad and i own over 600 movies. I am in my high school band. I want to be a movie director when i grow up. I really enjoy making friends.

content.text: What is your favorite type of music?
I like a lot of different types of music, but I would say my favorite is classic rock.
Me too! I love classic rock. What are some of your favorite bands?
I love Led Zeppelin, The Beatles, The Rolling Stones, and Pink Floyd.
Those are all great bands! I love Led Zeppelin and The Beatles too.
I also like some newer bands, like The Killers and The Black Keys.
I've heard good things about The Killers. I'll have to check them out.
You should! They're really good.
What do you like about classic rock?
I love the energy and the passion in the music. It's just so much fun to listen to.
I agree. Classic rock is always a good choice when I'm in a good mood.
Me too! It's the perfect music to get me pumped up.
What are some of your favorite songs?

I have a lot of favorite songs, but some of my favorites include "Stairway to Heaven" by Led Zeppelin, "Yesterday" by The Beatles, "Brown Sugar" by The Rolling Stones, and "Comfortably Numb" by Pink Floyd.
Those are all great songs! I love them all.
Me too! They're some of the best songs ever written.
What do you think of music from your generation?
I think it's pretty good. There are some really talented artists out there today.
I agree. There are a lot of great bands and musicians out there.
What's your favorite band from your generation?
I don't really have a favorite band from my generation. I like a lot of different bands from different eras.
That's cool. I like to listen to a variety of music too.
Me too. I think it's important to keep an open mind about music.
I agree. There's so much good music out there, it's worth exploring.
